Hi Welcome ğŸ‘‹ to ğŸ®ğŸ®ğŸ® Loklak Tweet Bot ğŸ®ğŸ®ğŸ®! 
 This is a bot used to search and retrieve tweets, get the user profile info and do a lot more using Loklak API goodness. Also access the help at anytime using /help
Type /search [query] to query for the tweets
Type /user [userprofile] to retrieve information about the user profile
Type /anon to activate the anonymous mode
Type /delete to delete all the information we have of you
